primary_exclusion_reasons: General life insurance terms (ביטוח חיים) - outside business scope
National insurance/social security terms (ביטוח לאומי) - government service
Accident insurance terms (ביטוח תאונות) - different legal specialty
Insurance company contact information - not service-related
Unrelated professional insurance (teachers, tour guides) - outside scope
Low-quality expanded variations without business relevance

metrics_analysis_priorities: Focus on commercial intent keywords for volume assessment
Evaluate competition levels for high-relevance terms
Assess SERP features for informational keywords
Gather seasonal trends for claims-related terms
content_strategy_implications: Service pages for direct legal service keywords
Educational content for rights and eligibility terms
Local SEO opportunities for geographic keywords
Company-specific content for insurance brand terms
competitive_positioning: Legal specialization advantage over general insurance content
Problem-solving focus for claim denial situations
Professional credibility content for trust building
